ProjectTitle: Biochemical identification of susceptibility genes for Beet Yellows Virus in sugar beet
InitialFeedbackHistory:
12/04/2024
The questions in your DMP are missing, when downloading your DMP from DMP online please make sure to check both the boxes "question text and section headings" and "unanswered questions", best to do this now and submit as intermediate, but make sure the question text is there in the final DMP that FWO will request at the end of your project as part of the final report. 
Data: please also add the samples/materials that you will use, these are also considered physical data in the context of a DMP, how will you document, store, preserve and/or share those?
label: intermediate DMP needed
